## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? Is there something you can't do today that this would enable?

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you envision this feature working.

```bash

```

```csharp
// Code pattern that should be detected

{
    // ...
}
```

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any alternative solutions or workarounds?
